userid.description: Always required, to be included in all config files.

runid.description: Always required, to be included in all config files.

basinid.description: NHDplus featureid or name of preset basin (i.e. west_brook)

rscript.description: Name of the script that this config file is for. Always required, to be included in all config files.

preceding.description: json object of step: runid pairs. must include a pair for every step listed in this config file's preceding_step array
